pages.text: $(bgreen)Explode-O-Nut$() is the explosive version of a Wall-nut, not just a Wall-nut with red skin.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)150$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Huge Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)defender$() plant that has high health, and it can $(bred)attract enemies$() in 5 * 5 range to attack itself. It will $(bred)make a 8 x 8 explosion$() when died.
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will instantly $(bred)make explosions$() to enemies around.
